Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Minnesota in 1975...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/1977, off Daniel Pardo (NE)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/25/1977, off Emil Regalado (BC)...
Won World Championship with Minnesota in 1979...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Leftfield in 1979...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1982, hitting .556 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Boston (FBA) on 4/19/1983...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1983, hitting .480 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1983, hitting .548 with 5 HR, 14 RBI...
Hit 3 homeruns against Manchester, driving in 4 runs on 6/22/1984...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1984, hitting .455 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
